posts.post_content: Surprisingly, one of my bombs in the prerelease and one of my two star players in my deck. The fact it's so powerful for limited made this basically unblockable and my opponents couldn't do jack all to stop it from swinging in for 4. Even if they did, now they have to deal with a bigger creature which by then I would have won.
